lexUnit.name: ask.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: request to do or give something.

sentence.text: The allocator was given $10 and asked to divide the cash between himself and the receiver .
The crew was accused of trespassing and asked to leave by the police , who were called by the vicar when they arrived
